DOC.brief_summary: This study do find many woman develop lymphedema axillary lymph node dissection . The investigator also want look reason woman get lymphedema others n't . Specifically , investigator want test breast tissue remove time surgery see identify inflammation breast tissue , may increase woman 's risk lymphedema . The investigator also ask patient answer question see much quality life affect lymphedema , whether study help woman detect lymphedema earlier .
DOC.criteria: Female breast cancer patient age 18 Patients consent unilateral axillary lymph node dissection ( ALND ) Patients consent unilateral sentinel lymph node biopsy ( SLNB ) possible ALND eligible initial entry study , become ineligible ALND perform Male breast cancer patient Patients treat SLNB Patients consent bilateral axillary surgery Patients prior history SLNB ALND
